backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing user profiles, per-user daily totals, and access-controlled CRUD functions with principal-scoped storage keys.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branch-specific fixed print‑location logic, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files including calculator, balance sheet, optimize bill, UI components, and infrastructure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH color tokens with light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with title 'Varshini Classic Cuisine'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell gating access by branch authentication, rendering calculator, daily totals, or optimize bill views, plus print‑mode handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGatePag: Branch login gate UI with optional Internet Identity section and branded header/footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchLogin: Branch login form handling username/password input, submission state, and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchSessi: Shows current branch user and provides a logout button when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button for Internet Identity with status handling and error messaging.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Top notice bar showing link‑expiry guidance and a copy‑URL button with success/error states.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: UI to select a day and display its total revenue and item quantities using daily totals data.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Hook that loads available days and daily totals from backend or localStorage and syncs updates.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: LocalStorage-based utilities for computing, storing, and retrieving daily ledger and summary data.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Generates a unique bill code using timestamp and a random 4‑character suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines a predefined catalog of food items with prices and metadata.
Provides helpers to format numbers and currency in INR style.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Matches catalog items to existing line items using normalized labels and computes added quantities.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: Catalog UI for searching, grouping, managing, and adding predefined items with optional images.
Type definitions for the predefined item catalog component’s props.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: Renders a printable bill showing line items, subtotal, tax, discounts, and final total.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Handles saving, loading, and clearing bill records in branch‑scoped localStorage.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator UI managing line items, catalog additions, totals, bill saving, and printing.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Defines TypeScript interfaces for line items, calculator state, and breakdown totals.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Contains helpers for parsing numbers, clamping, and calculating totals, tax, and discounts.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Reads an image file and returns its data URL or errors if invalid.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/branc: Defines fixed print addresses for specific branches and utilities to check, retrieve, and enforce them.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: UI for configuring default receipt styles, payment image uploads, and print location settings.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Loads and saves bill format defaults in branch‑scoped localStorage, enforcing fixed print locations when applicable.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines available receipt style IDs, their metadata, and the default style.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook for reading and saving bill format defaults, enforcing fixed addresses and syncing updates to backend when logged in.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useSy: React hook that syncs print location from backend profile to local defaults unless the branch has a fixed address.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Displays a saved bill for printing, loads it using branch context, and triggers auto or manual printing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranchAuth.tsx: Implements simple branch‑level authentication with stored credentials and migrates legacy data on login or hydration.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: Hook that copies the current page URL to the clipboard with success/error tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity handling login, stored identities, and exposing login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, daily totals, and balance sheet through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and print-specific styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/utils/branchScopedStorage.t: Handles branch-scoped localStorage keys and migration from legacy global keys.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Utility wrapper for a confirmation dialog before deletions.
frontend/src/utils/iiProviderShim.ts: Sets a safe Internet Identity provider URL from Vite env or a default fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata including existing features, requirements, and state version.
